channel.title: Ip resting
channel.description:
ok so im trying to host my server, i set up a Static-IP but every couple day's or everyday my dad resets the router (wireless one). then my IP changes and my server goes offline. any fix for my ip staying the same even when the wireless router is reset?
i cant tell my dad to not reset it because he doesnt know i use my computer.

item.title: Ip resting
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Steve Epic Steve
item.description:
@Epic_Steve wrote:

These are my address reservations;

    Address Reservation
# 	IP Address 	   Device Name 	Mac Address
1	192.168.1.3	   Xbox	        00:22:48:6A:53:D8
2	192.168.1.8	   STEVEN-PC	00:1C:25:4D:E6:FD

As you can see it goes on MAC Address. It checks the MAC Address and everytime the DHCP client connects it gives it the specified IP Address.

Read full topic

item.title: Ip resting
item.dc:creator: @epkserver epkserver
item.description:
@epkserver wrote:

hmm, thanks.
but can you be a little more specific on what happens in this process? how will it keep the same IP?

Read full topic

item.title: Ip resting
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Steve Epic Steve
item.description:
@Epic_Steve wrote:

DHCP Reservation.

“A DHCP reservation is a permanent IP address assignment. It is a specific IP address within a DHCP scope that is permanently reserved for leased use to a specific DHCP client.”

You should be able to find the setting in your router.

Read full topic
